request_message: I'm struggling with finding my artistic voice and would love guidance on developing a cohesive body of work. I'm particularly interested in exploring cultural identity themes but feel stuck on how to translate personal experiences into visual art.
response_message: I'd be happy to help you explore your artistic voice! We can work on developing your personal narrative and finding authentic ways to express your cultural experiences through your art.
goals: Develop artistic voice, Create cohesive body of work, Explore cultural identity themes

request_message: I'm a street photographer looking to transition from hobby to professional practice. I need guidance on portfolio development, pricing my work, and approaching galleries.
goals: Professional development, Portfolio building, Gallery representation
